name: Trash Thrower
description:
Information

Trash Thrower is a first-person survival shooter where player fights off enemies while keeping the environment clean. The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible. Bad npc's that shoot at player or litter the world will make it harder and harder as the time passes. Player can get more points by throwing trash in appropriate cans and killing bad npc's. In the game there are also good npc's that just run around and if they die, the player loses points.

Platform

The game is made for android.

Current status

Waiting for feedback wheter to continue on an idea, make changes or add new functionality.

Feedback

Write any suggestions or thoughts that you have for the game, thanks!
